description: Single table detail in single instance
title: PG Table Detail

links.title: Rollup to cluster table detail for ${relname}
Rollup to table overview for single database
Rollup to table overview for single database

targets.expr: rate(pg_table_idx_tup_fetch{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) / rate(pg_table_idx_scan{ins="$ins",  datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m])
rate(pg_index_idx_tup_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname=~"$relname.*"}[1m]) / rate(pg_index_idx_scan{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname=~"$relname.*"}[1m])
